A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A great movie. Nice twists. Nice story. Overall a good movie.

Some people might say it has not allot of characther moments...it does have those. And its clearly trying to separate its self from old star wars by bringing forward a new cast\, and writing out the old one. It does this in a nice manner. Not force \, but still leaves you a bit sad.

A other point people hate is the plotlines. They hate that it has multiple ones. If you do not like movies with story ...go watch the fast and the furious etc

Great movie\, bad fans
